data.comment: The match has started at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Throw-in for San Jose at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 1, San Jose have a dangerous throw-in.
Colorado needs to be cautious. San Jose have an attacking throw-in.
San Jose to take a throw-in in Colorado territory.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Colorado close to the penalty box.
In Commerce City Colorado attack through Kellyn Acosta. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 5, In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Drew Fischer signals a San Jose throw-in in Colorado's half.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to San Jose's area.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of San Jose.
Colorado's Andre Shinyashiki is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Colorado's Lalas Abubakar attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Drew Fischer awards San Jose a goal kick.
Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 10, Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Colorado.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Marcos Lopez of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Commerce City.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
San Jose drives forward and Jackson Yueill gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 14, Throw-in high up the field for San Jose in Commerce City.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Jose's half?
Corner awarded to Colorado.
In the minute 17, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Cristian Espinoza of San Jose smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 19, Free kick Colorado.
Andre Shinyashiki (Colorado) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
San Jose's Carlos Fierro gets in a shot on goal at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Colorado.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Colorado.
Lalas Abubakar (Colorado) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 24, San Jose have a goal kick.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Important block from the San Jose defence as Braian Galvan fires in a strike for Colorado.
Colorado's Jack Price has run offside.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Colorado in the half of San Jose.
Goal! A Cole Bassett header gives Colorado a 1-0 lead in Commerce City.
Jack Price instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 38, Free kick San Jose.
Kellyn Acosta (Colorado) gets a yellow card.
San Jose are coming forward and Jackson Yueill gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Commerce City.
Drew Fischer signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to San Jose's area.
Keegan Rosenberry gets his shot on target but fails to score for Colorado.
In the minute 41, Can San Jose capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Colorado's half?
Throw-in Colorado.
Andy Rios (San Jose) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 42, Drew Fischer awards Colorado a goal kick.
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Judson is booked for the away team.
In the minute 44, San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Andre Shinyashiki (Colorado) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, Drew Fischer will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In the minute 45, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Drew Fischer blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In Commerce City Colorado drive forward through Jack Price. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 46, Chris Wondolowski is replacing Cade Cowell for the away team.
In the minute 47, Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
San Jose have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Jonathan Lewis puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Great play from Kellyn Acosta to set up the goal.
In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Colorado's Jonathan Lewis gets in a shot but it is blocked by a San Jose defender.
In the minute 55, Colorado have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Colorado's Braian Galvan breaks free at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to San Jose.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a Colorado throw-in in San Jose's half.
In the minute 60, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
The home team have replaced Keegan Rosenberry with Jeremy Kelly. This is the first substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
Nicolas Mezquida is on a sub for Kellyn Acosta for Colorado.
In the minute 61, San Jose push forward at Dick's Sporting Goods Park and Judson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Colorado defence.
In the minute 63, San Jose have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Danny Hoesen for San Jose drives towards goal at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Matias Jesus Almeyda (San Jose) is making a second substitution, with Vako Qazaishvili replacing Carlos Fierro.
The away team replace Marcos Lopez with Shea Salinas.
Danny Hoesen is replacing Andy Rios for San Jose at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 65, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Colorado.
Throw-in for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 67, Colorado to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of Colorado.
Drew Fischer signals a San Jose throw-in in Colorado's half.
In the minute 68, Colorado make their third substitution with Drew Moor replacing Braian Galvan.
Robin Fraser is making the team's fourth substitution at Dick's Sporting Goods Park with Nicolas Benezet replacing Jonathan Lewis.
San Jose needs to be cautious. Colorado have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 70, Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's fifth substitution at Dick's Sporting Goods Park with Paul Marie replacing Cristian Espinoza.
It's now 3-0 thanks to an own goal from Tommy Thompson.
In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Colorado in their own half.
The home team replace Jack Price with Collen Warner.
In the minute 76, Jackson Yueill (San Jose) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
San Jose have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Colorado's Nicolas Benezet misses with an attempt on goal.
Drew Fischer awards San Jose a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Colorado take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Nicolas Mezquida.
Auston Trusty with an assist there.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to San Jose.
In the minute 82, Drew Fischer awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Andre Shinyashiki extends Colorado's lead to 5-0.
That's a fine assist from Cole Bassett.
In the minute 86, Can Colorado get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
Free kick for Colorado in the half of San Jose.
Danny Hoesen (San Jose) has received a yellow card from Drew Fischer.
In the minute 87, It's a goal kick for the away team in Commerce City.
Throw-in San Jose.
Full-time! The final score is 5-0.
